name: Abhisekh Baid
position: Startups Lead @AWS | Cloud Sales | Mentor | Investor | Emerging Markets | Fintech | SaaS
about: Seasoned professional with over 13 years of experience in account management, technology sales for startups and digital companies. Certified AWS Solution Architect Associate with expertise in cloud technology. Passionate about building customer success stories through adoption of new age technologies.

recommendations: Napa Eze-Onwusah ‚ÄúI recommend Abhisekh as a business leader. His extensive knowledge in helping startups to grow and scale, considering both business and technical aspects, is commendable. Abhisekh is adept at developing strategic sales plans that consistently deliver solid results. His collaborative approach with stakeholders underscores his effectiveness as a leader. He is a valuable asset for any business in need of growth and strategic planning expertise.‚Äù

Unnikrishnan EV ‚ÄúI have been working with Abhishek for more than a year on a major AWS migration project. With his assistance and tremendous support we could migrate multiple on-premise projects into AWS within a time span for 4-5 months. His knowledge and control over various AWS technologies is awesome. He is also very good in proposing solutions and bringing right people on resolving issues on time. He is a great asset to any team he belongs to. Wish him all the very best in his future endeavours. ‚Äù
